name: Malyn's Journey
description:
Hello everyone! This is the first game that I have fully finished and will be releasing for others to play. Any feedback that you have is greatly appreciated and I hope that you enjoy the game!

Description

Help guide Malyn through the woods outside his village! Solve puzzles to progress through the forest and help Malyn get home before nightfall!

This game is still in early access and may have bugs and unfinished content.
